Living Room Stage Set from Loot™

The Living Room Stage Set provides Home users the opportunity to shout “lights, camera, action!” while collaborating with their friends to bring their own movies and television shows to life. The product comes with working lights and cameras, as well as props and backdrops.
Additionally, the owner has the option to use any items that they already have purchased in Home while in the Stage Set. The Living Room Stage Set is the first of many Stage Sets coming from your friends at Loot™.
